logistic regression ( LR ) classifier.from sentence: BOW is a conventional approach using a logistic regression ( LR ) classifier trained with binary BOW features to predict the correct answer .

based on.from sentence: BOW - DT is based on the BOW baseline augmented with the feature set with dependency relation indicators .
QANTA is an approach based on a recursive neural network to derive the distributed representations of questions .

bidirectional recurrent neural network (.from sentence: FTS - BRNN is based on the bidirectional recurrent neural network ( RNN ) with gated recurrent units ( GRU ) .
